00039 /// simple structure for holding Spectrum info 
00040 struct PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumInfo
00041 {
00042     /// structure for Precursor info 
00043     struct PWIZ_API_DECL PrecursorInfo
00044     {
00045         size_t index;
00046         double mz;
00047         double intensity;
00048         double charge;
00049 
00050         PrecursorInfo() : index((size_t)-1), mz(0), intensity(0), charge(0) {}
00051     };
00052 
00053     size_t index;
00054     std::string id;
00055     std::string nativeID;
00056     int scanNumber;
00057     CVID massAnalyzerType;
00058     int scanEvent;
00059     int msLevel;
00060     double retentionTime; // seconds
00061     std::string filterString;
00062     double mzLow;
00063     double mzHigh;
00064     double basePeakMZ;
00065     double basePeakIntensity;
00066     double totalIonCurrent;
00067     std::vector<PrecursorInfo> precursors;
00068     std::vector<MZIntensityPair> data;
00069 
00070     SpectrumInfo()
00071     :   index((size_t)-1), scanNumber(0), massAnalyzerType(CVID_Unknown), scanEvent(0), 
00072         msLevel(0), retentionTime(0), mzLow(0), mzHigh(0), basePeakMZ(0), 
00073         basePeakIntensity(0), totalIonCurrent(0)
00074     {}
00075 
00076     void update(const Spectrum& spectrum);
00077     void clearBinaryData();
00078 };
